Title: How to Delegate Decision-Making the Right Way with Stacy Tuschl
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Stacy Tuschl, a bestselling author, speaker and the founder of multiple seven-figure businesses. She shares how to train your team to make decisions like you do by creating effective systems and processes. Later in the episode, George chats with Daniel Ramsey, the executive vice president of EntreLeadership, about how to delegate responsibilities when a leader leaves the company.

You’ll learn:

  • The danger of making all the decisions for your team
  • If your team knows how you make decisions
  • How delegation can free up your time
  • How to keep going when a leader leaves
